author: eptwts
text:
very grounding to realize that you're just a sheltered little bitch that happened to have enough free time & got lucky enough to stumble upon the right info & acted on it...

and there is NOTHING wrong with that, as long you're a not a narcissist w/ a fragile ego

there's no upside in deluding yourself into thinking that what you've accomplished was particularly hard & that what you want to accomplish will be either

can't name a single person in this space who i'd imagine works harder than your average construction worker

an 8 hour shift on your laptop does NOT equal an 8 hour shift on the site
